none: Aerial view of Lagos Island and Five Cowrie Creek
82 mm (height) x 103 on 89 mm (height) x 140 mm (width)
Edward Harland Duckworth photographs--Cities--Lagos, Nigeria--Aerial and elevated views

The football ground (with Force Road on its right side) is in the lower left corner. Five Cowrie Creek bridge extends toward Victoria Island. MacGregor Canal is just visible at the bend in the Creek, with the Creek Hospital ("European Hospital") on the far side

The works on this web site, from material in the collections of the Melville J. Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

Edward Harland Duckworth (1894 -1972) was a British expatriate officer who was the founding editor of Nigeria magazine. Collection consists chiefly of photographic prints and slides documenting early 20th century Nigeria.
